name: The Wishing Well (TheGamerUrso)
description:
You are a employee of the WishingWell Comporation. Thier reputation is at stake as more and more peple stop visiting and believing in their power. It is your job to make people believe at them again and keep their legacy alive.

How to Play:
On the Left there will be people coming and they will wish something.

On the right it is the city where you can find all the stuff people want.

Click on the right Item to teleport it to the right Person;

Just have in mind you have to go in order. First come, first served

The items desperate and appearing again after a sec.

Try to please people and gain reputation.

In the middle you can see the coin fall into the well when they reach the bottom time out and the person will be disappointed.

Enjyo!

A game made in 48 hours for GameDevHQGameJam #gamedevhqgamejam
